title: Russia
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 401 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 600L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     T and Y
description: From modern Moscow to the frozen north to the Sea of Okhotsk, Russia is a stunningly beautiful country. Learn more about its land, people, and wildlife with this engaging text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
